alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 300 PM MST... At 215 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Freeman, or 24 miles west of Casa Grande, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maricopa, Freeman, Stanfield and Ak-Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 142 and 172. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 41 and 44. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
